priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Subject Characteristic Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89980

self.title: CDISC SEND Subject Characteristic Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology for the test names concerned with the distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.
name: SEND Subject Characteristics Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Subject Characteristic Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: A secondary sequence of characters used to identify a subject.
A plan that specifies a diet, amount and schedule of nutritional intake.
The hue of a subject's hair or fur. (NCI)
A distinctive observable characteristic of an object. (NCI)
The name of the organization that supplied the test subjects. (NCI)
The geographic location of the organization that supplied the test subjects.
Numeric ID assignment by United States Department of Agriculture for test facilities.
